alert.note: Alert for Holt; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 3:24PM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Increasing mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 12 to 20 inches and ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Holt and Loup Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility at times late tonight and Tuesday. Ice and snow on power lines may cause scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow totals across the northwestern portions of the area. Highest ice totals across the southeast portions of the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
